data.text: @Sophiedoyle46 Hi Sophie. I'm sorry to hear about what happened. Please send us a DM to assist with your seat. Thanks – Jeff
@miss_you112 We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks – Vi 2/2
@miss_you112 Hi Stephanie, the use of masks is mandatory on all flights and in all airports across Australia, except where a medical exemption exists. 1/2
@CPoerwantoro Hi Clive. I understand that you need assistance with your flight. To check this further, kindly send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@HumblePanda Hi @HumblePanda, thanks for reaching out. Adding baggage on a post-booking will be added to the total baggage allowance you initially purchased. We always recommend adding baggage at the time of booking, as this is when baggage is at its cheapest. -Jen
@AFMMMMMMM Hey there. You can use your NZ license for travel within Australia as long as this is not expired. Thanks - Chichi

urls.title: Travel identification: domestic flights within Australia and New Zealand | Jetstar
urls.description: Your guide to travel identification requirements when travelling with Jetstar on domestic flights within Australia and New Zealand.

data.text: @AFMMMMMMM Hi @AFMMMMMMM, thanks for reaching out. You can read more about our Travel Identification here - https://t.co/XEclZby2qC. If you need further assistance, you can send us a DM. Thanks. -Kauri

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Fields of study
domain.description: for all fields of study, e.g., futurology, microbiology

data.text: @Ziggy_Spider Hi Haley, thanks for reaching out. I can confirm the airport itself is called ‘Ayers Rock Airport’ (Airport Code AYQ) which is reflected on airport terminal signage. Jetstar’s marketing of the route refers to Uluru. Thanks – Chichi
@Chrisquirk Hi Chris, sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Thanks – Bree

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: @xamyjadeee Hi Amz, I appreciate you're looking for more direct flights to Bali. We're continuously reviewing our networks, and you may keep an eye on our website for more updates. It may also help you to know our latest travel advisories here: https://t.co/JacLSKO81a. Thanks - Bree

@Geoff_Hanley Hi Geoff, thanks for getting in touch. Due to the ongoing border restrictions in Western Australia, our schedule will remain suspended until the end of March. You can read more here - https://t.co/RMJiyvjsvJ. Thanks – Jeff

@pensandphotos Hi, Christie. You’ll always be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your Jetstar Airways flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Terms and Conditions apply. If you need further assistance, feel free to DM us. Thanks – Bree

@malissas Hi Malissa, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you require assistance with your booking about options, please send us DM to speak with an agent. - Jeff
@BeierM1 Hi Melody, sorry to hear that your flights have been cancelled. We'd like to assist you with your booking options. Could you please send us a DM? Thanks - Leslie

@Geoff_Hanley Hi Geoff, we do have flights from Perth-Cairns offered in July 2022. Check out our flights here -  https://t.co/o67BbZ4wB4. If you require assistance with your Jetstar booking, we’d be happy to help – just send us a DM to an agent. Thanks- Jen

@king89perth Hi @king89perth, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info?. We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Perth. –  Jeff

@WCE92940618 Hi Morsey, thanks for reaching out. Our team is evaluating our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. However - sometimes there are cancellations or delays for a number of reasons. If you need to discuss a specific booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Dan

@Enilyks_ Hi there, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? Just key in the code JQINV585. Thanks – Cheyenne

@CCZorbaCC Hi Zorba, sorry to hear that your flight was altered. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please send us a Direct Message. Thanks – Dan
@markus_misins Hi there, thanks for reaching out. We'd be happy to look into it. Can you provide your booking reference number and the full name as listed on the booking? - Cheyenne
@cardiganchick1 That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Gabby. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further?  Thanks - Paul
@Edujdom Hi there, I appreciate you booking a flight with us. If you require any assistance, you can send us a DM and we’d be happy to help. Thanks – Vi

@LorenzTosti Hi Lorenz.tosti, thanks for reaching out. Our offer will depend on the fare rules you purchased. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. -Jen
@deminovak_ Hi Demi, I'm sorry to hear about this. I can also appreciate how long you must have already been waiting. Please feel free to send us a DM here so we can assist you. Thanks - Bree
@joelrock81 Hi Joel, sorry to hear your flight has been changed and delayed again. Can you send us a DM so we can look into your options? Thanks - Bree
@theunbeliever69 Hi Pee, we’re having some problems with our site – but we’re working on it! Also, feel free to send us a DM if you need further assistance on your booking. Thanks - Bree
@nikivelkoska Hi Niki, I understand how upsetting this may be for you. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi
@nikivelkoska Hi there. I'm sorry to hear that you’re having trouble accessing our website. It may help if you clear the cache and cookies saved in your browser. Thanks – Vi

@Get_itchy Hi Hans, I understand how upsetting it can be if there are extra fees. Your carry-on allowance is separate to your checked baggage allowance, which means there are still excess baggage fees if you go over the carry-on weight limit before you board your flight. Thanks - Vi

@Get_itchy Hi Hans, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. However, for exceeding baggage, fees would apply. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@Get_itchy Hi Hans, sorry to hear about your experience. We limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger. If you think you need more next time you travel, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. Thanks – Chichi

@AndresDeltre Hi Andres, we know how inconvenient changes in flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

@lauraaaanne18 Hi Laura, thanks for reaching out.  Saved Vouchers feature is still turned off in my wallet however, you can view your voucher details directly to our website using this link https://t.co/4DeHa0OJLv, hope that helps. Thanks - Dan
@arif_0720 Hi Arif, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can further assist? Thanks - Vi

@tomrquicksell Hi Tom, sorry to hear that you're having trouble selecting your client's seat online. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @arif_0720 Hey Arif! Thanks for your tweet. How can we assist you today? - Chichi
@JGWelsh Hi Jack, hopefully you got on your way without too much delay. If you have any more queries about your booking, just feel free to DM us for assistance. Thanks  - Bree

@melifluousninja Hi Daniel, I can appreciate how frustrating it was for you. To keep things moving, if you have a little extra carry-on, you can buy a 7kg top-up. Our team does spot checks to make sure passengers are only carrying the 7kg allowed on board. Thanks - Paul

urls.title: Excess baggage charges at the airport | Jetstar
urls.description: Your guide to Jetstar's policy regarding excess baggage checked in at the airport for domestic and international flights, including fees.

data.text: @melifluousninja Hi Daniel, I know how upsetting it must be to pay an extra charge. Your carry-on allowance is separate from your checked baggage allowance - which means there are still extra charges if you go over the weight limit. You may also view here: https://t.co/FwAck3ozfG. Thanks - Bree

@oliverzip Hi Oliver, we know how inconvenient changed flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info, so we can look into your options? Thanks - Bree
@waynetunks Hi Wayne, sorry to hear that you are receiving multiple emails. I can see why this is frustrating. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. Thanks - Leslie
@mamila_jain That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Jamila – and we’re sure Bronwyn and all the Cabin Crews will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Jaya
@Hails506 Hi Hayley. Thanks for reaching out, would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Dan

@akinajy Hey Akin, we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to look into this further. Please DM us with some more info so we can follow this up internally. Thanks – Bree

@cassy9613 Hi Cassy, we’ll need passengers to comply with any state or federal government travel requirements as there are various travel requirements in place across Australia. You can check this link for more info about travel requirements - https://t.co/EfBCwKmHHE. Thanks – Kauri

urls.title: Sales and special deals | Jetstar
urls.description: Rather be on holiday? Check out Jetstar’s latest sales, deals and exclusive offers. Find domestic and international flights at the lowest price guaranteed, backed by our Price Beat Guarantee. Conditions apply.

data.text: @sezbian Hi Sarah, great idea! Our team is always open to new ideas and we evaluate our schedules all the time to see how we can improve. We'll be sure to pass your feedback on. In the meantime, you might want to keep an eye on our deals page - https://t.co/vyNoqJqoyO 🙂 - Kauri
@willjephcott Hi Will, sorry to hear that you haven't received your refund yet. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

@bellaugello Hi Bellaugello. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We'd like to check this further for you. Kindly send us a DM with your full name  and booking reference. Thanks - Chichi

@xXMissCanonXx Hi MissCanon, I'm sorry to hear about your cancelled flights. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM with more info? Thanks- Jen

@Happy_kiddo Hi Nidhi, I understand that you're alarmed about the email sent to you. If you didn't contact us on that day, you can disregard the email. Please don't hesitate to send us a DM if you need further assistance with your Jetstar booking. Thanks- Jen

@chrisbarr45 This isn't the experience we'd want our passengers to have, I'm sorry about that Chris. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@dklaic Hey Damir, I certainly understand having a cancelled flight is never a good feeling. Would you mind sending us a DM here with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Norine

@dklaic Hi Damir, I'm sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need more assistance with your booking, please feel free to send us a DM and we'll gladly help. Thanks - Bree
@_tanjastark Hi Tanja, thanks for reaching out. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Leslie
@HutchHussein Hi Hutch, we’d love the chance to chat with you about your voucher and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM with more info? Thanks- Jen
@3aw_caller Hi there, sorry to hear about your cancelled flight. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie

@Dzed1313 Hi there. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change.  We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi
@Comet2st Hi Comet, sorry to hear that your flight has been cancelled. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Singapore. Thanks – Leslie

@dhcropley Hi David, I appreciate you're also having difficulty trying to reach us. If you're using web, just click Messages in the left navigation bar. You'll see the Direct Message history, then click the New message icon at the top. Just enter our username @JetstarAirways. Thanks - Bree
@TheHonMacca Hi, Matt. Sorry to hear that your holiday was cancelled. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Paul

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.

data.text: @djantidope Hi @djantidope. I'm sorry to hear you’re having trouble accessing our Jetstar App using your iOS device. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya

@LanaMurphy Hi Lana, I’m really sorry to hear about your experience this morning. Unfortunately some delays like this one are out of our hands but understand it’s really frustrating. Please feel free to DM us if you have any questions and hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. Thanks – Chichi
@JimmyRob78 That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Ray – and we’re sure they will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! – Jaya
@saumya6sep Hi there. Our carry-on restrictions are 7kgs in total for each passenger – with the option to purchase an extra 7kgs if they need to bring a little more onboard. I hope that helps - Vi
@garth182 That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @garth182. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jaya

urls.title: COVID-related flight changes and cancellations | Jetstar
urls.description: With travel restrictions changing regularly due to COVID-19, you may need to change your travel plans. Check your options for flexible flying here.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @tonyreeswoods Hi Tony, thanks for reaching out. If your Jetstar flights are affected by covid restrictions and you’re due to depart within 7 days, you may be eligible for a credit voucher - https://t.co/s1lr2c1a3N. Feel free to DM us so we can assist. Thanks – Chichi

@dhcropley Hi David, sorry to hear about the cancelled flight. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please send us a DM with your booking number? Thanks. – Kauri
@JaydenTHunter Hi Jayden, I appreciate you were having difficulties trying to book your flights online. Could you send us a DM so we could take a further look into this for you? Thanks - Bree

@molavalette Hi Mo. I'm sorry to hear about your cancelled flight, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Perth. Thanks– Jen
@katspat Don’t worry Kat – the starfish are just dancing 💃 💃

@simonfrary Hi Simon. I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
@lucky703 This info is available on our website - https://t.co/mwdXGdLDFT along with more helpful hints on connecting flights. We do hope you enjoyed your flight with us today. Thanks - Vi 2/2

data.text: @lucky703 Hi Anne, thanks for reaching out. We know travelling can be stressful at times, especially on multiple flights. When transferring between domestic flights, you’ll need to collect your baggage and check back in. 1/2

@Danhuggett Hi Daniel. I'm sorry to hear about your cancelled flight, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to Adelaide. Thanks- Jen
@that_fiona Hi Fiona, sorry to hear about that. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@AngeMaryClaire Hi Angela. I'm sorry to hear about what happened with your baggage, that’s not the sort of experience we want you to have with us. Would you mind sending us a DM with more details? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jen

@gilary_h Hey Hilary, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great customer service experience. Thanks for the shoutout! We’ll definitely let Ariadne know, she'll be stoked to hear it. Cheers! -  Bree

@Gauravchhajed2 Yes Gaurav, the flights are still operational from Perth to Brisbane on the 5th of February. I can also see that the fares on that week are already sold out. Also feel free to go through Manage Booking to check your flight status: https://t.co/IEr6u9wlPH. Thanks - Bree

@robboloveswords Hi Jess. Sorry to hear your flight got cancelled and I apologise if the service you received does not meet your expectations. Feel free to send us a DM if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine
@bradleyinsydney Hi there, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks –  Jaya
@SazzarJ Hi Sarah, I'm sorry to hear about your voucher. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi

@DavidMc04144365 Hi David, we comply with the government's travel requirements. If it's stated that you need to get vaccinated or provide a medical exemption, it's the same policy that we would need to follow. As mentioned, it depends on what your travel destination requires. Thanks - Bree

@DavidMc04144365 Hi David, we follow the latest government advice, and strongly recommend that you confirm this with the regional travel government especially from Thailand. If they are not requiring you anything more than the vaccination and medical exemption, you're good to go. Thanks - Bree

@DavidMc04144365 Hi David. You must meet both transit and destination requirements and the strictest requirements will apply. I highly recommend you check the relevant travel authorities to confirm your eligibility.  You can check more details about it here - https://t.co/42aHJAThMT. Thanks-Jen

@Spot_the_G Hi Gavin,  I understand how upsetting it can be when you've made plans in advance and the flight got changed. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to PM us so we can discuss your options and assist. Thanks - Jen

@DanielW25747559 Hi Fabius, I understand why this may be disappointing. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to your destination. Thanks- Jen
@toldham700 Hi Tom, thanks for reaching us out. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi
@MichaelDaltonJ Glad to hear about how you've got it sorted out online, Michael! Enjoy the rest of your day. Cheers! - Bree

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar

data.text: @super_spazzz Hi there, you're now chatting with Bree. Testing requirements depend on where you're coming to and from. Please visit our Travel Alerts page for travel advisories before your flight, and to be directed to the relevant government website: https://t.co/1WsR6wwlP8. Thanks - Bree

@SuePhoAu Hi @SuePhoAu, sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled.  We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible.  Could you please send us a DM so we can look for options and assist? Thanks - Jen

data.text: @dolloppy Hi Dolloppy, we limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger – including things like handbags and laptop bags. If you think you might need a little more next time you travel, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. Thanks – Jen
@lawrie_thompson We’re so glad our check-in counter staff was on-hand to help make your experience with us a great one. We’ll definitely pass on the feedback (I’m sure it’ll make their day!) – Jaya

@AdelaideBarmies Hey there, there’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! We’ll definitely pass this on to Max, Belle, and the team, they’ll be stoked to hear it. :) - Bree
@catherinemary0 That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Catherine  – and we’re sure they will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! –  Jaya
@adamnpower That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, Adam. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thanks - Jaya

@michaeljsmiddy Hi Michael, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd appreciate the chance to look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@ProjectEby I'm sorry but it is something we're unable to guarantee. I suggest you check our website from time to time for more updates. Thanks - Jaya
@ProjectEby Due to the current situation, we need to limit our flights. We're continuously reviewing our operations and we'll update our website with new flights soon. Thanks - Jaya

@ProjectEby Hi there. I appreciate that you wanted a direct flight from Sydney to Phuket. As of the moment the next available direct flight would be on the 5th of March. I recommend that you keep an eye on us for any updates here - https://t.co/nVkYpNIZfZ. Thanks - Vi

@SebasBonell Hi Sebastian, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Vi
